N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, Appendices, app 2 - Positions Classified in the Noncompetitive Class under Section 2.2 of the Rules for the Classified Service

State Regulations

Except for those position titles for which a limited number is
specifically prescribed herein, the titles listed in this Appendix shall be
deemed to bear the designation "unlimited," and noncompetitive class
appointments may be made to any and all positions classified under such titles
in the departments or agencies under which they are listed. STATE DEPARTMENT SERVICE
